attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
FRESHWATER ,(ON THE WEST SIDE OF THE ISLE OF WIGHT) HAS ALWAYS BEEN KNOWN AS A VILLAGE , BUT WITH ALL THE ONGOING CONSTRUCTION OF HOUSES , FRESHWATER WILL LOSE ITS' IDENTITY OF A VILLAGE....

WHY ALL THE BUILDING- WHEN THERE IS NOT ENOUGH JOBS TO GO ROUND FOR ALL THE HOUSES BEING BUILT ??

WHEN WILL FRESHWATER LOSE ITS INDEPENDENCE AS A RURAL VILLAGE..STOP THIS NOW PLEASE TONY BLAIR..LISTEN TO US..THANKS

rejection.details: The title of a petition must be a call to action, not your name. Also, please re-submit without using BLOCK CAPS.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
